page.title: 18HAZEL SLADE SCHOOL
page.content: {Hazel Slade School}is the only primary school in the village. It takes children aged from five to eleven years. The old building was built in the nineteen thirties when Hazel Slade was a mining village and it is made of wood. A new extension has been added recently adding a hall and four new classrooms,making eight permanent classrooms. There are also two temporary classrooms. The school has eight teachers and two permanent helpers. Some parents help the teachers and children on a regular basis.The permanent helpers help with things like art which is very interesting and assist in the tuition of musical instruments like the drums and recorders. It is a friendly school in a lovely setting{on the edge of Cannock Chase}.
